getting-sublists-with-slices_key2: Just as an index can get a single value from a list, a slice can get several values from a list, in the form of a new list. A slice is typed between square brackets, like an index, but it has two integers separated by a colon. Notice the difference between indexes and slices.
getting-sublists-with-slices_key3: spam[2] is a list with an index (one integer).
getting-sublists-with-slices_key4: spam[1:4] is a list with a slice (two integers).
